description.value: You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Comprehend Language], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mindlink], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Secret Page] as innate occult spells, each once per day. When you cast secret page, it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from Magical Edification.
